name: Lake Spacetime
description:
MADE FOR THE 2020 EPIC MEGAJAM

HOW TO PLAY:

- Move the boat with the arroy keys or WASD.

- Search and collect star dust.

- Once you have enough star dust, press tab to enter fishing mode.

- In fishing mode you can select the spot where you want to throw the hook by moving the marker with the arrow keys or WASD.

- You can also select the type of hook you want to use: Star Hook or Planet Hook, each consumes a different amount of star dust, if you don’ t have enough you can always search for more on the lake.

- Press spacebar to throw the hook then wait for the bite, once it catches something press spacebar repeatedly to reel it in, and voila! You have created a new star or planet.

Create complete star systems around the lake and enjoy the ride.

The game uses the following PRE-MADE ASSETS:

Music: Canon In D Interstellar Mix by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/6960-canon-in-d-interstellar-mix

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Fisher boat 3D Model by Batuhan13

Link: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/fisher-boat-385b039e95754dca8d8c045ed0c515cf

License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

The boat was scaled and new materials were created within Unreal using the original textures.

Alien 3D Model by jiayingc

Link: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/cute-alien-6f22524b43a8490aa6ab6dc76e103b37

License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

A new texture for the eyes was created, it was rigged and animated, new materials were created within Unreal.

Materials and textures from Unreal Engine’s Starter Content

Vehicle Advance Blueprint template
